/*jobFair.selectJobFairList*/ SELECT FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(A.ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM, FN_GET_FAIR_NM(A.FAIR_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_NM, A.FAIR_DIV_CD, FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_DIV_CD', A.FAIR_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_DIV_NM, CASE WHEN A.FAIR_DIV_CD = 'FDC0000000001' THEN 'ncpf' WHEN A.FAIR_DIV_CD = 'FDC0000000002' THEN 'pcpf' WHEN A.FAIR_DIV_CD = 'FDC0000000003' THEN 'ep' WHEN A.FAIR_DIV_CD = 'FDC0000000004' THEN 'mj' WHEN A.FAIR_DIV_CD = 'FDC0000000005' THEN 'rf' ELSE '' END AS FAIR_DIV_CLASS, CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_BGN_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.FAIR_BGN_HOUR, ':', A.FAIR_BGN_MINUTE, ' ', A.FAIR_BGN_AMPM) AS FAIR_BGN_DT, CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_END_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.FAIR_END_HOUR, ':', A.FAIR_END_MINUTE, ' ', A.FAIR_END_AMPM) AS FAIR_END_DT, A.FAIR_SEQ, A.FAIR_STS_CD, FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_STS_CD', A.FAIR_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_STS_NM, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.EMAIL, FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{regUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000002', A.FAIR_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ, FN_GET_FILE_PATH(A.THUMB_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS FILE_URL FROM CPES_FAIR_MST A
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

/*jobFair.selectJobFairInfo*/ SELECT FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(A.ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM, FN_GET_FAIR_NM(A.FAIR_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_NM, A.FAIR_DIV_CD, FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_DIV_CD', A.FAIR_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_DIV_NM, CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_BGN_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.FAIR_BGN_HOUR, ':', A.FAIR_BGN_MINUTE, ' ', A.FAIR_BGN_AMPM) AS FAIR_BGN_DT, CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_END_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.FAIR_END_HOUR, ':', A.FAIR_END_MINUTE, ' ', A.FAIR_END_AMPM) AS FAIR_END_DT, A.FAIR_SEQ, A.FAIR_STS_CD, FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_STS_CD', A.FAIR_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_STS_NM, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.EMAIL, FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{regUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000002', A.FAIR_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ, A.BKMK_CNT, A.FAIR_HASHTAG, A.GOOGLE_MAP_LINK, A.FAIR_COMPNY_VIEW_YN, A.FAIR_INSTT_VIEW_YN, A.FAIR_TRNNG_VIEW_YN, A.FAIR_VACANCY_VIEW_YN, A.FAIR_WORKSHOP_VIEW_YN, CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN A.FAIR_DTL_EXPLN_KH ELSE A.FAIR_DTL_EXPLN_EN END AS FAIR_DTL_EXPLN_NM, CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN B.JC_KH ELSE B.JC_EN END AS JC_NM, FN_GET_FILE_PATH(A.THUMB_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS FILE_URL FROM CPES_FAIR_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN CPES_JOB_CENTER B ON A.JC_CD = B.JC_CD
mapper.sql:
ORDER BY
B.VIEW_CNT DESC
B.BKMK_CNT DESC
B.REG_DT DESC

WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.FAIR_VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.ADDR_FULL_CD LIKE CONCAT(#{condType},'%')
AND (
A.FAIR_NM_KH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')
A.FAIR_NM_EN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')
OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CPES_JOB_CENTER WHERE JC_CD = A.JC_CD
AND JC_KH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')
AND JC_EN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')
) )
AND A.FAIR_DIV_CD = #{condFairDivCd}

ORDER BY
A.BKMK_CNT DESC
A.REG_DT DESC
mapper.select:
/*jobFair.selectJobFairApplyList*/ SELECT FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(A.ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_FAIR_NM(A.FAIR_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_NM , A.FAIR_DIV_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_DIV_CD', A.FAIR_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_DIV_NM , CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_BGN_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.FAIR_BGN_HOUR, ':', A.FAIR_BGN_MINUTE, ' ', A.FAIR_BGN_AMPM) AS FAIR_BGN_DT , CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_END_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.FAIR_END_HOUR, ':', A.FAIR_END_MINUTE, ' ', A.FAIR_END_AMPM) AS FAIR_END_DT , A.FAIR_SEQ , A.FAIR_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_STS_CD', A.FAIR_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_STS_NM , A.TEL1 , A.TEL2 , A.EMAIL , FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{regUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000002', A.FAIR_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ , A.THUMB_FILE_GRP_SEQ , ( SELECT SAVE_FILE_PATH FROM CPES_ATTACH_FILES WHERE FILE_GRP_SEQ = A.THUMB_FILE_GRP_SEQ LIMIT 1 ) AS FILE_PATH
, (SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_ONLINE_PATCPTN WHERE FAIR_SEQ=A.FAIR_SEQ AND USER_SEQ=#{regUserSeq}) AS APPLY_CNT
, (SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_ONLINE_PATCPTN WHERE FAIR_SEQ=A.FAIR_SEQ AND USER_SEQ=#{regUserSeq}) AS APPLY_CNT
, (SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_PATCPTN_COMPNY WHERE FAIR_SEQ=A.FAIR_SEQ AND COMPNY_SEQ=(SELECT COMPNY_SEQ FROM CPES_COMPNY WHERE USER_SEQ=#{regUserSeq})) AS APPLY_CNT
, (SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_PATCPTN_INSTT WHERE FAIR_SEQ=A.FAIR_SEQ AND INSTT_SEQ =(SELECT INSTT_SEQ FROM CPES_INSTT WHERE USER_SEQ=#{regUserSeq})) AS APPLY_CNT
, 0 AS APPLY_CNT
FROM CPES_FAIR_MST A
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

/*jobFair.selectJobFairInfo*/ SELECT FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(A.ADDR_FULL_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_FAIR_NM(A.FAIR_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_NM , A.FAIR_DIV_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_DIV_CD', A.FAIR_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_DIV_NM , CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_BGN_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.FAIR_BGN_HOUR, ':', A.FAIR_BGN_MINUTE, ' ', A.FAIR_BGN_AMPM) AS FAIR_BGN_DT , CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.FAIR_END_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.FAIR_END_HOUR, ':', A.FAIR_END_MINUTE, ' ', A.FAIR_END_AMPM) AS FAIR_END_DT , CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_BGN_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.RECURMT_BGN_HOUR, ':', A.RECURMT_BGN_MINUTE, ' ', A.RECURMT_BGN_AMPM) AS RECURMT_BGN_DT , CONCAT(FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_END_DT, #{langCd}), ' ', A.RECURMT_END_HOUR, ':', A.RECURMT_END_MINUTE, ' ', A.RECURMT_END_AMPM) AS RECURMT_END_DT , A.FAIR_SEQ , A.FAIR_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_STS_CD', A.FAIR_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_STS_NM , A.TEL1 , A.TEL2 , A.EMAIL , FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{regUserSeq}, 'BCT0000000002', A.FAIR_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ , IFNULL(BKMK_CNT,0) AS BKMK_CNT , A.FAIR_HASHTAG , A.GOOGLE_MAP_LINK , A.ADDR_FULL_NM, A.ADDR_DTL, A.ADDR_DTL2 , CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN A.FAIR_DTL_EXPLN_KH ELSE A.FAIR_DTL_EXPLN_EN END AS FAIR_DTL_EXPLN_NM , CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN B.JC_KH ELSE B.JC_EN END AS JC_NM , A.BOOTH_TEL , A.BOOTH_EMAIL , A.BOOTH_FEE_EXPLN , A.BOOTH_FILE_GRP_SEQ , A.FAIR_FILE_GRP_SEQ , A.SPONSOR_FILE_GRP_SEQ , A.SUPPORTER_FILE_GRP_SEQ
, (SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_ONLINE_PATCPTN WHERE FAIR_SEQ=A.FAIR_SEQ AND USER_SEQ=#{regUserSeq}) AS APPLY_CNT
, (SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_ONLINE_PATCPTN WHERE FAIR_SEQ=A.FAIR_SEQ AND USER_SEQ=#{regUserSeq}) AS APPLY_CNT
, (SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_PATCPTN_COMPNY WHERE FAIR_SEQ=A.FAIR_SEQ AND COMPNY_SEQ=(SELECT COMPNY_SEQ FROM CPES_COMPNY WHERE USER_SEQ=#{regUserSeq})) AS APPLY_CNT
, (SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_PATCPTN_INSTT WHERE FAIR_SEQ=A.FAIR_SEQ AND INSTT_SEQ =(SELECT INSTT_SEQ FROM CPES_INSTT WHERE USER_SEQ=#{regUserSeq})) AS APPLY_CNT
, 0 AS APPLY_CNT
, ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_BOOTH WHERE FAIR_SEQ = #{condSeq} AND BOOTH_STS_CD = 'BSC0000000001' ) AS BOOTH_AVAILABLE_CNT FROM CPES_FAIR_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN CPES_JOB_CENTER B ON A.JC_CD = B.JC_CD WHERE A.FAIR_SEQ = #{condSeq}

/*jobFair.selectJobFairTermList*/ SELECT A.FAIR_SEQ , FN_GET_FAIR_NM(A.FAIR_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_NM , A.FAIR_DIV_CD , A.FAIR_STS_CD , DATE_FORMAT(A.FAIR_BGN_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS FAIR_BGN_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.FAIR_END_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS FAIR_END_DT , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('FAIR_STS_CD', A.FAIR_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS FAIR_STS_NM FROM CPES_FAIR_MST A WHERE A.FAIR_BGN_DT <= #{fairEndDt} AND A.FAIR_END_DT >= #{fairBgnDt} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.FAIR_VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.REG_DT
